fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Business and Industry, Youth, Single market, Regional Policy, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Sport
eu_initiatives: Digital Agenda, Copyright policy, audiovisual and media policy, cultural policy, innovation, development of cities and regions (creative spillover), EU strategy for cultural diplomacy, support for creative SMEs
source: European Commission (studies as consortium partner), Creative Europe (project as consortium partner),
goals__remit:
Cabinet de conseil et d'etude specialisé dans le secteur des industries culturelles, des loisirs, des media et du sport. Nous proposons des services de recherches et d'analyse, de conseils en affaires publiques, de relations publique et de gestion de réseaux et associations. 
Nous cherchons également des financements européens pour des activités culturelles.
relevant_communication: Culture for Cities and Regions project (Creative Europe); Creative Tracks project (Creative Europe); SPARKS project (H2020). Creative SpIN project (Urbact); KiiCS arts and science project (FP7); Connecting Arts and Business project, Smart Guide on Creative Spillovers (publication); ACP+ project - Improving exports through acquisition of market-driven business skills for cultural entrepreneurs in Carribean countries; European, What about Union? Culture in the European project (publication)
customers: Entidad de gestión de derechos de propiedad intelectual
